sentences.sContent: Thus one was the Byron of Bengal, another the Emerson and so forth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thus one was the Byron of Bengal, another the Emerson and so forth.
sentences.sCn: 于是，这个是孟加拉的拜论，那个是孟加拉的爱默生，如此等等①。

sentences.sContent: It well reflects the calligrapher 's personal feelings, knowledge, personality, and so forth.
sentences.sContent_eng: It well reflects the calligrapher 's personal feelings, knowledge, personality, and so forth.
sentences.sCn: 它能很好地反映出书法家的个人感情、知识、个性等等。

sentences.sContent: Before you move in, you can make a list of any marks, scratches, and so forth that are already there.
sentences.sContent_eng: Before you move in, you can make a list of any marks, scratches, and so forth that are already there.
sentences.sCn: 在搬进去住之前，您可以先把那里原有的任何污痕、刮伤等等列出一张清单。
